text:
Cricket Australia 327/5, Live Cricket Score, India A vs Australia three day warm up game at Mumbai: Australia in command entering Day 2 Australia 327/5, Live Cricket Score, India A vs Australia three day warm up game at Mumbai: Australia in command entering Day 2 Live cricket score of India A vs Australia warm up game in Mumbai. India A vs Australia live score, Ind vs Aus live score, live cricket score Ind A vs Aus By: Express Web Desk | Updated: February 18, 2017 9:39 am Live cricket score, India A vs Australia, Day 2: Steve Smith retired after scoring a ton on Day 1. (Source: PTI) 
0930 IST: Play underway at Brabourne Stadium with Mitchell Marsh on 17 and Matthew Wade on 8. Navdeep Saini bowling from one end for India A and Hardik Pandya on the other 
India ‘A’ are playing Australia to give the visitors some much needed test ahead of the bigger tussle that awaits them in Pune starting Feb 23. On Day 1, India A captained by Hardik Pandya won the toss and opted to bowl first. Australia, batting first, had a merry time playing the seam attack with plenty of spin options not getting the purchase as they would have liked and K Goutham sitting out after suffering from cramps in the hot and dry conditions of Mumbai. This allowed Steve Smith and Shaun Marsh to smack centuries and then draw play to a close at 327/5. India A bagged two early wickets but couldn’t make the most of the opportunity as the wicket turned flat with play progressing. © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd Best of Express
